About

Michael G. Bauer is an artist, musician and therapist (LMFT, Registered Art Therapist) living in Los Angeles. In 2015 Bauer graduated with an M.A. from Loyola Marymount University in Marital Family Therapy and Clinical Art Therapy and became a licensed Marital Family Therapist in 2017. He was born in 1982 and studied Art at UCLA. His work often explores the psychological experience and draws from a wide breadth of interests including group work, cognitive behavior therapy and elements of positive psychology.
